title: What are some mind blowing technology inventions available in our time? - Quora

response.answer_text: I can think of three either available in some way or near term. Carbon fiber building and manufacturing materials, nanotechnology and biological memory and computing components.
For me the hand held medical scanner that portrays all video images directiv to an iPhone. https://newatlas.com/butterfly-iq-smartphone-ultrasound/51962/
